  • All Implemented Interfaces:

extends Object
implements CacheObjectInterface, Serializable

      • hasEvents

        public boolean hasEvents(EventType _eventtype)
        Does this instance have Event, for the specified EventType ?
        Parameters:
        _eventtype - type of event to check for
        Returns:
        true, if this instance has a trigger, otherwise false.

      • executeEvents

        public List<Return> executeEvents(EventType _eventtype,
                         Object... _args)
                           throws EFapsException
        The method gets all events for the given event type and executes them in the given order. If no events are defined, nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        _eventtype - type of event to execute
        _args - arguments used as parameter (doubles with first parameters defining the key, second parameter the value itself)
        Returns:
        List with Returns
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • executeEvents

        public List<Return> executeEvents(EventType _eventtype,
                         Parameter _param)
                           throws EFapsException
        The method gets all events for the given event type and executes them in the given order. If no events are defined, nothing is done.
        Parameters:
        _eventtype - type of event to execute
        _param - Parameter to be passed to the esjp
        Returns:
        List with Returns
        Throws:
        EFapsException - on error

      • readFromDB4Properties

        protected void readFromDB4Properties()
                              throws CacheReloadException
        The instance method reads the properties for this administration object. Each found property is set with instance method setProperty(java.lang.String, java.lang.String).
        Throws:
        CacheReloadException - on error
        See Also:
        setProperty(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

      • readFromDB4Links

        protected void readFromDB4Links()
                         throws CacheReloadException
        Reads all links for this administration object. Each found link property is set with instance method setLinkProperty.
        Throws:
        CacheReloadException - on error
        See Also:
        setLinkProperty(java.util.UUID, long, java.util.UUID, java.lang.String)
